original_text: And when they shall blow with them, all the assembly shall assemble themselves to thee at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
korean_text: 나팔 두 개를 불 때에는 온 회중이 회막 문 앞에 모여서 네게로 나아올 것이요

sentences.original_text: And when they shall blow with them
all the assembly shall assemble themselves to thee
at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation
